treatments_requested.name: H.P. Acthar Gel
treatments_requested.other_or_notes: Used for treatment of lupus nephritis

guidelines_details: Acthar gel is FDA indicated for nephrotic range proteinuria and has been used successfully to treat lupus nephritis.
soc_details: Peer-reviewed literature supports Acthar gel for significant disease activity reduction in lupus nephritis.

study_details.key_findings: Acthar gel may provide significant disease activity reduction in patients with systematic lupus erythematosus.

rationale: The requested H.P. Acthar gel 80 units is medically necessary for treatment of the patient's persistent nephrotic range proteinuria. The Health Plan’s denial should be overturned.
reviewer_credentials: Board certified in internal medicine with sub-specialty certification in nephrology, actively practicing, expert in treatment of lupus nephritis.
